articles.title: David Birney, star of 'St. Elsewhere' and 'Bridget Loves Bernie,' dead at 83 - New York Post
articles.description: David Birney, star of “Bridget Loves Bernie” and “St. Elsewhere,” died Friday. He was 83.
articles.content: David Birney, star of TV’s “Bridget Loves Bernie” and “St. Elsewhere” and Broadway’s “Amadeus,” died Friday at his home in Santa Monica, Calif., after a five-year battle with Alzheimer’s disease. He … [+3903 chars]

articles.title: Met Gala 2022: Priscilla Presley, 76, stuns in a black dress with Elvis star Austin Butler - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 76-year-old ex-wife of Elvis Presley looked stunningly youthful in an all-black ensemble. She was joined by Austin Butler, 30, who plays her late ex in Baz Luhrmann's new Elvis biopic.
articles.content:
Priscilla Presley had company on Monday when she walked the red carpet at the Met Gala with Elvis star Austin Butler.
